                                                                                                                            },
                                                                                                                          • "default_ingress": "https://sample-golang-zyhgn.ondigitalocean.app",
                                                                                                                          • "created_at": "2021-02-10T16:45:14Z",
                                                                                                                          • "updated_at": "2021-02-10T17:06:56Z",
                                                                                                                          • "active_deployment": {
                                                                                                                              },
                                                                                                                            • "last_deployment_created_at": "2021-02-10T17:05:30Z",
                                                                                                                            • "live_url": "https://sample-golang-zyhgn.ondigitalocean.app",
                                                                                                                            • "region": {
                                                                                                                                },
                                                                                                                              • "tier_slug": "basic",
                                                                                                                              • "live_url_base": "https://sample-golang-zyhgn.ondigitalocean.app",
                                                                                                                              • "live_domain": "sample-golang-zyhgn.ondigitalocean.app",
                                                                                                                              • "project_id": "88b72d1a-b78a-4d9f-9090-b53c4399073f",
                                                                                                                              • "domains": [
                                                                                                                                  ]
                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                              }

                                                                                                                              List App Deployments

                                                                                                                              List all deployments of an app.

                                                                                                                              Authorizations:
                                                                                                                              bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                              path Parameters
                                                                                                                              app_id
                                                                                                                              required
                                                                                                                              string
                                                                                                                              Example: 4f6c71e2-1e90-4762-9fee-6cc4a0a9f2cf

                                                                                                                              The app ID

                                                                                                                              query Parameters
                                                                                                                              page
                                                                                                                              integer >= 1
                                                                                                                              Default: 1
                                                                                                                              Example: page=1

                                                                                                                              Which 'page' of paginated results to return.

                                                                                                                              per_page
                                                                                                                              integer [ 1 .. 200 ]
                                                                                                                              Default: 20
                                                                                                                              Example: per_page=2

                                                                                                                              Number of items returned per page

                                                                                                                              Responses

                                                                                                                              production

                                                                                                                              https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/apps/{app_id}/deployments

                                                                                                                              Request samples

                                                                                                                              • cURL
                                                                                                                              curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/apps/{app_id}/deployments"

                                                                                                                              Response samples

                                                                                                                              • 200
                                                                                                                              • 401
                                                                                                                              • 404
                                                                                                                              • 429
                                                                                                                              • 500
                                                                                                                              • default
                                                                                                                              Content type
                                                                                                                              application/json
                                                                                                                              {
                                                                                                                              • "deployments": [
                                                                                                                                • {
                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                  ],
                                                                                                                                • "links": {
                                                                                                                                  • "pages": { }
                                                                                                                                  },
                                                                                                                                • "meta": {
                                                                                                                                  • "total": 1
                                                                                                                                  }
                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                Create an App Deployment

                                                                                                                                Creating an app deployment will pull the latest changes from your repository and schedule a new deployment for your app.

                                                                                                                                Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                path Parameters
                                                                                                                                app_id
                                                                                                                                required
                                                                                                                                string
                                                                                                                                Example: 4f6c71e2-1e90-4762-9fee-6cc4a0a9f2cf

                                                                                                                                The app ID

                                                                                                                                Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                force_build
                                                                                                                                boolean (Indicates whether to force a build of app from source even if an existing cached build is suitable for re-use)

                                                                                                                                Responses

                                                                                                                                production

                                                                                                                                https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/apps/{app_id}/deployments

                                                                                                                                Request samples

                                                                                                                                • Payload
                                                                                                                                • cURL
                                                                                                                                Content type
                                                                                                                                application/json
                                                                                                                                {
                                                                                                                                • "force_build": true
                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                Response samples

                                                                                                                                • 200
                                                                                                                                • 401
                                                                                                                                • 404
                                                                                                                                • 429
                                                                                                                                • 500
                                                                                                                                • default
                                                                                                                                Content type
                                                                                                                                application/json
                                                                                                                                {
                                                                                                                                • "deployment": {
                                                                                                                                  • "id": "b6bdf840-2854-4f87-a36c-5f231c617c84",
                                                                                                                                  • "spec": {
                                                                                                                                      },
                                                                                                                                    • "services": [
                                                                                                                                        ],
                                                                                                                                      • "phase_last_updated_at": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z",
                                                                                                                                      • "created_at": "2020-07-28T18:00:00Z",
                                                                                                                                      • "updated_at": "2020-07-28T18:00:00Z",
                                                                                                                                      • "cause": "commit 9a4df0b pushed to github/digitalocean/sample-golang",
                                                                                                                                      • "progress": {
                                                                                                                                          },
                                                                                                                                        • "phase": "PENDING_BUILD",
                                                                                                                                        • "tier_slug": "basic"
                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                      }

                                                                                                                                      Retrieve an App Deployment

                                                                                                                                      Retrieve information about an app deployment.

                                                                                                                                      Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                      bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                      path Parameters
                                                                                                                                      app_id
                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                      string
                                                                                                                                      Example: 4f6c71e2-1e90-4762-9fee-6cc4a0a9f2cf

                                                                                                                                      The app ID

                                                                                                                                      deployment_id
                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                      string
                                                                                                                                      Example: 3aa4d20e-5527-4c00-b496-601fbd22520a

                                                                                                                                      The deployment ID

                                                                                                                                      Responses

                                                                                                                                      production

                                                                                                                                      https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/apps/{app_id}/deployments/{deployment_id}

                                                                                                                                      Request samples

                                                                                                                                      • cURL
                                                                                                                                      curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/apps/{app_id}/deployments/{deployment_id}"

                                                                                                                                      Response samples

                                                                                                                                      • 200
                                                                                                                                      • 401
                                                                                                                                      • 404
                                                                                                                                      • 429
                                                                                                                                      • 500
                                                                                                                                      • default
                                                                                                                                      Content type
                                                                                                                                      application/json
                                                                                                                                      {
                                                                                                                                      • "deployment": {
                                                                                                                                        • "id": "b6bdf840-2854-4f87-a36c-5f231c617c84",
                                                                                                                                        • "spec": {
                                                                                                                                            },
                                                                                                                                          • "services": [
                                                                                                                                              ],
                                                                                                                                            • "phase_last_updated_at": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z",
                                                                                                                                            • "created_at": "2020-07-28T18:00:00Z",
                                                                                                                                            • "updated_at": "2020-07-28T18:00:00Z",
                                                                                                                                            • "cause": "commit 9a4df0b pushed to github/digitalocean/sample-golang",
                                                                                                                                            • "progress": {
                                                                                                                                                },
                                                                                                                                              • "phase": "PENDING_BUILD",
                                                                                                                                              • "tier_slug": "basic"
                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                            }

                                                                                                                                            Cancel a Deployment

                                                                                                                                            Immediately cancel an in-progress deployment.

                                                                                                                                            Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                            bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                            path Parameters
                                                                                                                                            app_id
                                                                                                                                            required
                                                                                                                                            string
                                                                                                                                            Example: 4f6c71e2-1e90-4762-9fee-6cc4a0a9f2cf

                                                                                                                                            The app ID

                                                                                                                                            deployment_id
                                                                                                                                            required
                                                                                                                                            string
                                                                                                                                            Example: 3aa4d20e-5527-4c00-b496-601fbd22520a

                                                                                                                                            The deployment ID

                                                                                                                                            Responses

                                                                                                                                            production

                                                                                                                                            https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/apps/{app_id}/deployments/{deployment_id}/cancel

                                                                                                                                            Request samples

                                                                                                                                            • cURL
                                                                                                                                            curl -X POST \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/apps/{app_id}/deployments/{deployment_id}/cancel"

                                                                                                                                            Response samples

                                                                                                                                            • 200
                                                                                                                                            • 401
                                                                                                                                            • 404
                                                                                                                                            • 429
                                                                                                                                            • 500
                                                                                                                                            • default
                                                                                                                                            Content type
                                                                                                                                            application/json
                                                                                                                                            {
                                                                                                                                            • "deployment": {
                                                                                                                                              • "id": "b6bdf840-2854-4f87-a36c-5f231c617c84",
                                                                                                                                              • "spec": {
                                                                                                                                                  },
                                                                                                                                                • "services": [
                                                                                                                                                    ],
                                                                                                                                                  • "phase_last_updated_at": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z",
                                                                                                                                                  • "created_at": "2020-07-28T18:00:00Z",
                                                                                                                                                  • "updated_at": "2020-07-28T18:00:00Z",
                                                                                                                                                  • "cause": "commit 9a4df0b pushed to github/digitalocean/sample-golang",
                                                                                                                                                  • "progress": {
                                                                                                                                                      },
                                                                                                                                                    • "phase": "PENDING_BUILD",
                                                                                                                                                    • "tier_slug": "basic"
                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                  }

                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve Deployment Logs

                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve the logs of a past, in-progress, or active deployment. If a component name is specified, the logs will be limited to only that component. The response will include links to either real-time logs of an in-progress or active deployment or archived logs of a past deployment.

                                                                                                                                                  Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                  bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                  path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                  app_id
                                                                                                                                                  required
                                                                                                                                                  string
                                                                                                                                                  Example: 4f6c71e2-1e90-4762-9fee-6cc4a0a9f2cf

                                                                                                                                                  The app ID

                                                                                                                                                  deployment_id
                                                                                                                                                  required
                                                                                                                                                  string
                                                                                                                                                  Example: 3aa4d20e-5527-4c00-b496-601fbd22520a

                                                                                                                                                  The deployment ID

                                                                                                                                                  component_name
                                                                                                                                                  required
                                                                                                                                                  string
                                                                                                                                                  Example: component

                                                                                                                                                  An optional component name. If set, logs will be limited to this component only.

                                                                                                                                                  query Parameters
                                                                                                                                                  follow
                                                                                                                                                  boolean
                                                                                                                                                  Example: follow=true

                                                                                                                                                  Whether the logs should follow live updates.

                                                                                                                                                  type
                                                                                                                                                  required
                                                                                                                                                  string
                                                                                                                                                  Default: "UNSPECIFIED"
                                                                                                                                                  Enum: "UNSPECIFIED" "BUILD" "DEPLOY" "RUN"
                                                                                                                                                  Example: type=BUILD

                                                                                                                                                  The type of logs to retrieve

                                                                                                                                                  • BUILD: Build-time logs
                                                                                                                                                  • DEPLOY: Deploy-time logs
                                                                                                                                                  • RUN: Live run-time logs
                                                                                                                                                  pod_connection_timeout
                                                                                                                                                  string
                                                                                                                                                  Example: pod_connection_timeout=3m

                                                                                                                                                  An optional time duration to wait if the underlying component instance is not immediately available. Default: 3m.

                                                                                                                                                  Responses

                                                                                                                                                  production

                                                                                                                                                  https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/apps/{app_id}/deployments/{deployment_id}/components/{component_name}/logs

                                                                                                                                                  Request samples

                                                                                                                                                  • cURL
                                                                                                                                                  curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/apps/{app_id}/deployments/{deployment_id}/components/{component_name}/logs"

                                                                                                                                                  Response samples

                                                                                                                                                  • 200
                                                                                                                                                  • 401
                                                                                                                                                  • 404
                                                                                                                                                  • 429
                                                                                                                                                  • 500
                                                                                                                                                  • default
                                                                                                                                                  Content type
                                                                                                                                                  application/json
                                                                                                                                                  {
                                                                                                                                                  • "live_url": "https://logs-example/build.log",
                                                                                                                                                  • "url": "https://logs/build.log",
                                                                                                                                                  • "historic_logs": [
                                                                                                                                                    • "https://logs-example/archive/build.log"
                                                                                                                                                    ]
                                                                                                                                                  }

                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve Aggregate Deployment Logs

                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve the logs of a past, in-progress, or active deployment. If a component name is specified, the logs will be limited to only that component. The response will include links to either real-time logs of an in-progress or active deployment or archived logs of a past deployment.

                                                                                                                                                  Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                  bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                  path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                  app_id
                                                                                                                                                  required
                                                                                                                                                  string
                                                                                                                                                  Example: 4f6c71e2-1e90-4762-9fee-6cc4a0a9f2cf

                                                                                                                                                  The app ID

                                                                                                                                                  deployment_id
                                                                                                                                                  required
                                                                                                                                                  string
                                                                                                                                                  Example: 3aa4d20e-5527-4c00-b496-601fbd22520a

                                                                                                                                                  The deployment ID

                                                                                                                                                  query Parameters
                                                                                                                                                  follow
                                                                                                                                                  boolean
                                                                                                                                                  Example: follow=true

                                                                                                                                                  Whether the logs should follow live updates.

                                                                                                                                                  type
                                                                                                                                                  required
                                                                                                                                                  string
                                                                                                                                                  Default: "UNSPECIFIED"
                                                                                                                                                  Enum: "UNSPECIFIED" "BUILD" "DEPLOY" "RUN"
                                                                                                                                                  Example: type=BUILD

                                                                                                                                                  The type of logs to retrieve

                                                                                                                                                  • BUILD: Build-time logs
                                                                                                                                                  • DEPLOY: Deploy-time logs
                                                                                                                                                  • RUN: Live run-time logs
                                                                                                                                                  pod_connection_timeout
                                                                                                                                                  string
                                                                                                                                                  Example: pod_connection_timeout=3m

                                                                                                                                                  An optional time duration to wait if the underlying component instance is not immediately available. Default: 3m.

                                                                                                                                                  Responses

                                                                                                                                                  production

                                                                                                                                                  https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/apps/{app_id}/deployments/{deployment_id}/logs

                                                                                                                                                  Request samples

                                                                                                                                                  • cURL
                                                                                                                                                  curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/apps/{app_id}/deployments/{deployment_id}/logs"

                                                                                                                                                  Response samples

                                                                                                                                                  • 200
                                                                                                                                                  • 401
                                                                                                                                                  • 404
                                                                                                                                                  • 429
                                                                                                                                                  • 500
                                                                                                                                                  • default
                                                                                                                                                  Content type
                                                                                                                                                  application/json
                                                                                                                                                  {
                                                                                                                                                  • "live_url": "https://logs-example/build.log",
                                                                                                                                                  • "url": "https://logs/build.log",
                                                                                                                                                  • "historic_logs": [
                                                                                                                                                    • "https://logs-example/archive/build.log"
                                                                                                                                                    ]
                                                                                                                                                  }

                                                                                                                                                  List App Tiers

                                                                                                                                                  List all app tiers.

                                                                                                                                                  Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                  bearer_auth (read)

                                                                                                                                                  Responses

                                                                                                                                                  production

                                                                                                                                                  https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/apps/tiers

                                                                                                                                                  Request samples

                                                                                                                                                  • cURL
                                                                                                                                                  curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/apps/tiers"

                                                                                                                                                  Response samples

                                                                                                                                                  • 200
                                                                                                                                                  • 401
                                                                                                                                                  • 429
                                                                                                                                                  • 500
                                                                                                                                                  • default
                                                                                                                                                  Content type
                                                                                                                                                  application/json
                                                                                                                                                  {
                                                                                                                                                  • "tiers": [
                                                                                                                                                    • {
                                                                                                                                                        },
                                                                                                                                                      • {
                                                                                                                                                          },
                                                                                                                                                        • {
                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                          ]
                                                                                                                                                        }

                                                                                                                                                        Retrieve an App Tier

                                                                                                                                                        Retrieve information about a specific app tier.

                                                                                                                                                        Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                        bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                        path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                        slug
                                                                                                                                                        required
                                                                                                                                                        string
                                                                                                                                                        Example: basic

                                                                                                                                                        The slug of the tier

                                                                                                                                                        Responses

                                                                                                                                                        production

                                                                                                                                                        https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/apps/tiers/{slug}

                                                                                                                                                        Request samples

                                                                                                                                                        • cURL
                                                                                                                                                        curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/apps/tiers/{slug}"

                                                                                                                                                        Response samples

                                                                                                                                                        • 200
                                                                                                                                                        • 401
                                                                                                                                                        • 404
                                                                                                                                                        • 429
                                                                                                                                                        • 500
                                                                                                                                                        • default
                                                                                                                                                        Content type
                                                                                                                                                        application/json
                                                                                                                                                        {
                                                                                                                                                        • "tier": {
                                                                                                                                                          • "name": "Basic",
                                                                                                                                                          • "slug": "basic",
                                                                                                                                                          • "egress_bandwidth_bytes": "42949672960",
                                                                                                                                                          • "build_seconds": "24000"
                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                        }

                                                                                                                                                        List Instance Sizes

                                                                                                                                                        List all instance sizes for service, worker, and job components.

                                                                                                                                                        Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                        bearer_auth (read)

                                                                                                                                                        Responses

                                                                                                                                                        production

                                                                                                                                                        https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/apps/tiers/instance_sizes

                                                                                                                                                        Request samples

                                                                                                                                                        • cURL
                                                                                                                                                        curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/apps/tiers/instance_sizes"

                                                                                                                                                        Response samples

                                                                                                                                                        • 200
                                                                                                                                                        • 401
                                                                                                                                                        • 429
                                                                                                                                                        • 500
                                                                                                                                                        • default
                                                                                                                                                        Content type
                                                                                                                                                        application/json
                                                                                                                                                        {
                                                                                                                                                        • "instance_sizes": [
                                                                                                                                                          • {
                                                                                                                                                              },
                                                                                                                                                            • {
                                                                                                                                                                },
                                                                                                                                                              • {
                                                                                                                                                                  },
                                                                                                                                                                • {
                                                                                                                                                                    },
                                                                                                                                                                  • {
                                                                                                                                                                      },
                                                                                                                                                                    • {
                                                                                                                                                                        },
                                                                                                                                                                      • {
                                                                                                                                                                          },
                                                                                                                                                                        • {
                                                                                                                                                                            },
                                                                                                                                                                          • {
                                                                                                                                                                              },
                                                                                                                                                                            • {
                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                              ]
                                                                                                                                                                            }

                                                                                                                                                                            Retrieve an Instance Size

                                                                                                                                                                            Retrieve information about a specific instance size for service, worker, and job components.

                                                                                                                                                                            Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                            bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                            path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                            slug
                                                                                                                                                                            required
                                                                                                                                                                            string
                                                                                                                                                                            Example: basic-xxs

                                                                                                                                                                            The slug of the instance size

                                                                                                                                                                            Responses

                                                                                                                                                                            production

                                                                                                                                                                            https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/apps/tiers/instance_sizes/{slug}

                                                                                                                                                                            Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                            • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                            curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/apps/tiers/instance_sizes/{slug}"

                                                                                                                                                                            Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                            • 200
                                                                                                                                                                            • 401
                                                                                                                                                                            • 404
                                                                                                                                                                            • 429
                                                                                                                                                                            • 500
                                                                                                                                                                            • default
                                                                                                                                                                            Content type
                                                                                                                                                                            application/json
                                                                                                                                                                            {
                                                                                                                                                                            • "instance_size": {
                                                                                                                                                                              • "name": "Basic XXS",
                                                                                                                                                                              • "slug": "basic-xxs",
                                                                                                                                                                              • "cpu_type": "SHARED",
                                                                                                                                                                              • "cpus": "1",
                                                                                                                                                                              • "memory_bytes": "536870912",
                                                                                                                                                                              • "usd_per_month": "5.00",
                                                                                                                                                                              • "usd_per_second": "0.000002066799",
                                                                                                                                                                              • "tier_slug": "basic",
                                                                                                                                                                              • "tier_upgrade_to": "professional-xs"
                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                            }

                                                                                                                                                                            List App Regions

                                                                                                                                                                            List all regions supported by App Platform.

                                                                                                                                                                            Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                            bearer_auth (read)

                                                                                                                                                                            Responses

                                                                                                                                                                            production

                                                                                                                                                                            https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/apps/regions

                                                                                                                                                                            • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                            curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \

  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/apps/regions"

                                                                                                                                                                            {
