                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "app_bandwidth_usage": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "date": "2023-01-17T00:00:00Z"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve Multiple Apps' Daily Bandwidth Metrics

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve daily bandwidth usage metrics for multiple apps.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          app_ids
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Array of strings <= 100 items

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A list of app IDs to query bandwidth metrics for.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          date
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          string <date-time>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Optional day to query. Only the date component of the timestamp will be considered. Default: yesterday.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/apps/metrics/bandwidth_daily

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "app_ids": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "4f6c71e2-1e90-4762-9fee-6cc4a0a9f2cf",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "c2a93513-8d9b-4223-9d61-5e7272c81cf5"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "date": "2023-01-17T00:00:00Z"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "app_bandwidth_usage": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "date": "2023-01-17T00:00:00Z"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Billing

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The billing endpoints allow you to retrieve your account balance, invoices and billing history.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Balance: By sending requests to the /v2/customers/my/balance endpoint, you can retrieve the balance information for the requested customer account.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Invoices: Invoices are generated on the first of each month for every DigitalOcean customer. An invoice preview is generated daily, which can be accessed with the preview keyword in place of $INVOICE_UUID. To interact with invoices, you will generally send requests to the invoices endpoint at /v2/customers/my/invoices.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Billing History: Billing history is a record of billing events for your account. For example, entries may include events like payments made, invoices issued, or credits granted. To interact with invoices, you will generally send requests to the invoices endpoint at /v2/customers/my/billing_history.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get Customer Balance

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              To retrieve the balances on a customer's account, send a GET request to /v2/customers/my/balance.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              bearer_auth (read)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/customers/my/balance

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/customers/my/balance"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "month_to_date_balance": "23.44",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "account_balance": "12.23",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "month_to_date_usage": "11.21",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "generated_at": "2019-07-09T15:01:12Z"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              List Billing History

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              To retrieve a list of all billing history entries, send a GET request to /v2/customers/my/billing_history.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              bearer_auth (read)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/customers/my/billing_history

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/customers/my/billing_history"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "billing_history": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "links": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "pages": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "meta": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "total": 5
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    List All Invoices

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    To retrieve a list of all invoices, send a GET request to /v2/customers/my/invoices.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    query Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    per_page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    integer [ 1 .. 200 ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Default: 20
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Example: per_page=2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Number of items returned per page

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    integer >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Default: 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Example: page=1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Which 'page' of paginated results to return.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/customers/my/invoices

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/customers/my/invoices"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "invoices": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "invoice_preview": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "invoice_uuid": "1afe95e6-0958-4eb0-8d9a-9c5060d3ef03",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "amount": "34.56",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "invoice_period": "2020-02",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "updated_at": "2020-02-23T06:31:50Z"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "links": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "pages": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "meta": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "total": 70
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve an Invoice by UUID

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          To retrieve the invoice items for an invoice, send a GET request to /v2/customers/my/invoices/$INVOICE_UUID.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          invoice_uuid
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Example: 22737513-0ea7-4206-8ceb-98a575af7681

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          UUID of the invoice

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/customers/my/invoices/{invoice_uuid}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/customers/my/invoices/22737513-0ea7-4206-8ceb-98a575af7681"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "invoice_items": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "links": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "pages": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "meta": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "total": 6
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Retrieve an Invoice CSV by UUID

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                To retrieve a CSV for an invoice, send a GET request to /v2/customers/my/invoices/$INVOICE_UUID/csv.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                invoice_uuid
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Example: 22737513-0ea7-4206-8ceb-98a575af7681

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                UUID of the invoice

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/customers/my/invoices/{invoice_uuid}/csv

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: text/csv" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/customers/my/invoices/22737513-0ea7-4206-8ceb-98a575af7681/csv" --output invoice.csv

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                text/csv
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                product,group_description,description,hours,start,end,USD,project_name,category
Floating IPs,,Unused Floating IP - 1.1.1.1,100,2020-07-01 00:00:00 +0000,2020-07-22 18:14:39 +0000,$3.11,,iaas
Taxes,,STATE SALES TAX (6.25%),,2020-07-01 00:00:00 +0000,2020-07-31 23:59:59 +0000,$0.16,,iaas

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Retrieve an Invoice PDF by UUID

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                To retrieve a PDF for an invoice, send a GET request to /v2/customers/my/invoices/$INVOICE_UUID/pdf.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                invoice_uuid
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Example: 22737513-0ea7-4206-8ceb-98a575af7681

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                UUID of the invoice

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/customers/my/invoices/{invoice_uuid}/pdf

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/pdf" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/customers/my/invoices/22737513-0ea7-4206-8ceb-98a575af7681/pdf" --output invoice.pdf

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "id": "unauthorized",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "message": "Unable to authenticate you."
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Retrieve an Invoice Summary by UUID

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                To retrieve a summary for an invoice, send a GET request to /v2/customers/my/invoices/$INVOICE_UUID/summary.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                invoice_uuid
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Example: 22737513-0ea7-4206-8ceb-98a575af7681

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                UUID of the invoice

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/customers/my/invoices/{invoice_uuid}/summary

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/customers/my/invoices/22737513-0ea7-4206-8ceb-98a575af7681/summary"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "invoice_uuid": "22737513-0ea7-4206-8ceb-98a575af7681",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "billing_period": "2020-01",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "amount": "27.13",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "user_name": "Sammy Shark",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "user_billing_address": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "address_line1": "101 Shark Row",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "city": "Atlantis",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "region": "OC",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "postal_code": "12345",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "country_iso2_code": "US",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "created_at": "2019-09-03T16:34:46.000+00:00",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "updated_at": "2019-09-03T16:34:46.000+00:00"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "user_company": "DigitalOcean",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "user_email": "sammy@digitalocean.com",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "product_charges": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "name": "Product usage charges",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "amount": "12.34",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "items": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "overages": {
