                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "name": "Overages",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "amount": "3.45"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "taxes": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "name": "Taxes",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "amount": "4.56"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "credits_and_adjustments": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "name": "Credits & adjustments",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "amount": "6.78"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Block Storage

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  DigitalOcean Block Storage Volumes provide expanded storage capacity for your Droplets and can be moved between Droplets within a specific region.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Volumes function as raw block devices, meaning they appear to the operating system as locally attached storage which can be formatted using any file system supported by the OS. They may be created in sizes from 1GiB to 16TiB.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  By sending requests to the /v2/volumes endpoint, you can list, create, or delete volumes as well as attach and detach them from Droplets

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  List All Block Storage Volumes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  To list all of the block storage volumes available on your account, send a GET request to /v2/volumes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Filtering Results

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  By Region

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The region may be provided as query parameter in order to restrict results to volumes available in a specific region. For example: /v2/volumes?region=nyc1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  By Name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  It is also possible to list volumes on your account that match a specified name. To do so, send a GET request with the volume's name as a query parameter to /v2/volumes?name=$VOLUME_NAME. Note: You can only create one volume per region with the same name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  By Name and Region

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  It is also possible to retrieve information about a block storage volume by name. To do so, send a GET request with the volume's name and the region slug for the region it is located in as query parameters to /v2/volumes?name=$VOLUME_NAME&region=nyc1.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  query Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Example: name=example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The block storage volume's name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  region
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  string (region_slug)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Enum: "ams1" "ams2" "ams3" "blr1" "fra1" "lon1" "nyc1" "nyc2" "nyc3" "sfo1" "sfo2" "sfo3" "sgp1" "tor1"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Example: region=nyc3

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The slug identifier for the region where the resource is available.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  per_page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  integer [ 1 .. 200 ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Default: 20
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Example: per_page=2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Number of items returned per page

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  integer >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Default: 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Example: page=1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Which 'page' of paginated results to return.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/volumes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  # List all volumes
curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/volumes?region=nyc1"

# List volumes filtered by name
curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/volumes?name=example"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Example
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  All Volumes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "volumes": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "links": { },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "meta": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "total": 2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Create a New Block Storage Volume

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      To create a new volume, send a POST request to /v2/volumes. Optionally, a filesystem_type attribute may be provided in order to automatically format the volume's filesystem. Pre-formatted volumes are automatically mounted when attached to Ubuntu, Debian, Fedora, Fedora Atomic, and CentOS Droplets created on or after April 26, 2018. Attaching pre-formatted volumes to Droplets without support for auto-mounting is not recommended.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Any of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A human-readable name for the block storage volume. Must be lowercase and be composed only of numbers, letters and "-", up to a limit of 64 characters. The name must begin with a letter.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      description
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      An optional free-form text field to describe a block storage volume.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      size_gigabytes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      integer

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The size of the block storage volume in GiB (1024^3).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      tags
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Array of strings (tags_array) Nullable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A flat array of tag names as strings to be applied to the resource. Tag names may be for either existing or new tags.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      snapshot_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The unique identifier for the volume snapshot from which to create the volume.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      filesystem_type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The name of the filesystem type to be used on the volume. When provided, the volume will automatically be formatted to the specified filesystem type. Currently, the available options are ext4 and xfs. Pre-formatted volumes are automatically mounted when attached to Ubuntu, Debian, Fedora, Fedora Atomic, and CentOS Droplets created on or after April 26, 2018. Attaching pre-formatted volumes to other Droplets is not recommended.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      region
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string (region_slug)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Enum: "ams1" "ams2" "ams3" "blr1" "fra1" "lon1" "nyc1" "nyc2" "nyc3" "sfo1" "sfo2" "sfo3" "sgp1" "tor1"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The slug identifier for the region where the resource will initially be available.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      filesystem_label
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string <= 16 characters

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The label applied to the filesystem. Labels for ext4 type filesystems may contain 16 characters while labels for xfs type filesystems are limited to 12 characters. May only be used in conjunction with filesystem_type.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/volumes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Example
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ext4 volume
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "size_gigabytes": 10,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "name": "ext4-example",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "description": "Block store for examples",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "region": "nyc1",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "filesystem_type": "ext4",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "filesystem_label": "ext4_volume_01"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 201
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 400
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "volume": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "id": "506f78a4-e098-11e5-ad9f-000f53306ae1",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "region": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "droplet_ids": [ ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "name": "example",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "description": "Block store for examples",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "size_gigabytes": 10,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "filesystem_type": "ext4",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "filesystem_label": "example",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "created_at": "2020-03-02T17:00:49Z"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Delete a Block Storage Volume by Name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Block storage volumes may also be deleted by name by sending a DELETE request with the volume's name and the region slug for the region it is located in as query parameters to /v2/volumes?name=$VOLUME_NAME&region=nyc1. No response body will be sent back, but the response code will indicate success. Specifically, the response code will be a 204, which means that the action was successful with no returned body data.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        query Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example: name=example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The block storage volume's name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        region
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        string (region_slug)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Enum: "ams1" "ams2" "ams3" "blr1" "fra1" "lon1" "nyc1" "nyc2" "nyc3" "sfo1" "sfo2" "sfo3" "sgp1" "tor1"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example: region=nyc3

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The slug identifier for the region where the resource is available.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/volumes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        curl -X DELETE \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/volumes?name=example&region=nyc1"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "id": "unauthorized",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "message": "Unable to authenticate you."
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Retrieve an Existing Volume Snapshot

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        To retrieve the details of a snapshot that has been created from a volume, send a GET request to /v2/volumes/snapshots/$SNAPSHOT_ID.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        integer or string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example: 6372321

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Either the ID of an existing snapshot. This will be an integer for a Droplet snapshot or a string for a volume snapshot.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/volumes/snapshots/{snapshot_id}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        curl -X GET \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/volumes/snapshots/fbe805e8-866b-11e6-96bf-000f53315a41"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "snapshot": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "id": "8fa70202-873f-11e6-8b68-000f533176b1",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "name": "big-data-snapshot1475261774",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "regions": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "created_at": "2020-09-30T18:56:14Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "resource_id": "82a48a18-873f-11e6-96bf-000f53315a41",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "resource_type": "volume",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "min_disk_size": 10,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "size_gigabytes": 10,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "tags": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Delete a Volume Snapshot

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            To delete a volume snapshot, send a DELETE request to /v2/snapshots/$SNAPSHOT_ID.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            A status of 204 will be given. This indicates that the request was processed successfully, but that no response body is needed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            integer or string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Example: 6372321

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Either the ID of an existing snapshot. This will be an integer for a Droplet snapshot or a string for a volume snapshot.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/volumes/snapshots/{snapshot_id}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            curl -X DELETE \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/snapshots/fbe805e8-866b-11e6-96bf-000f53315a41"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "id": "unauthorized",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "message": "Unable to authenticate you."
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Retrieve an Existing Block Storage Volume

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            To show information about a block storage volume, send a GET request to /v2/volumes/$VOLUME_ID.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            volume_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            string <uuid>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Example: 7724db7c-e098-11e5-b522-000f53304e51

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            The ID of the block storage volume.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/volumes/{volume_id}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            # Retrieve an existing volume
curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/volumes/7724db7c-e098-11e5-b522-000f53304e51"

# Retrieve and existing volume by name
curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/volumes?name=example&region=nyc1"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            application/json
