                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "links": { },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "meta": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "total": 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Initiate A Block Storage Action By Volume Id

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        To initiate an action on a block storage volume by Id, send a POST request to ~/v2/volumes/$VOLUME_ID/actions. The body should contain the appropriate attributes for the respective action.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Attach a Block Storage Volume to a Droplet

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Attribute Details
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        type This must be attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        droplet_id Set to the Droplet's ID
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        region Set to the slug representing the region where the volume is located

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Each volume may only be attached to a single Droplet. However, up to seven volumes may be attached to a Droplet at a time. Pre-formatted volumes will be automatically mounted to Ubuntu, Debian, Fedora, Fedora Atomic, and CentOS Droplets created on or after April 26, 2018 when attached. On older Droplets, additional configuration is required.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Remove a Block Storage Volume from a Droplet

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Attribute Details
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        type This must be detach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        droplet_id Set to the Droplet's ID
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        region Set to the slug representing the region where the volume is located

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Resize a Volume

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Attribute Details
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        type This must be resize
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        size_gigabytes The new size of the block storage volume in GiB (1024^3)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        region Set to the slug representing the region where the volume is located

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Volumes may only be resized upwards. The maximum size for a volume is 16TiB.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        volume_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        string <uuid>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example: 7724db7c-e098-11e5-b522-000f53304e51

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The ID of the block storage volume.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        query Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        per_page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        integer [ 1 .. 200 ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Default: 20
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example: per_page=2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Number of items returned per page

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        integer >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Default: 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example: page=1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Which 'page' of paginated results to return.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The volume action to initiate.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        region
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        string (region_slug)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Enum: "ams1" "ams2" "ams3" "blr1" "fra1" "lon1" "nyc1" "nyc2" "nyc3" "sfo1" "sfo2" "sfo3" "sgp1" "tor1"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The slug identifier for the region where the resource will initially be available.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        droplet_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        integer (volume_action_droplet_id)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The unique identifier for the Droplet the volume will be attached or detached from.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        tags
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Array of strings (tags_array) Nullable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        A flat array of tag names as strings to be applied to the resource. Tag names may be for either existing or new tags.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/volumes/{volume_id}/actions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        VolumeActionAttach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "type": "attach",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "droplet_id": 11612190,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "region": "nyc1",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "tags": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "aninterestingtag"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 202
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        volume_action_attach_response
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "action": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "id": 72531856,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "status": "completed",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "type": "attach_volume",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "started_at": "2020-11-12T17:51:03Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "completed_at": "2020-11-12T17:51:14Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "resource_type": "volume",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "region": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "region_slug": "nyc1"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve an Existing Volume Action

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          To retrieve the status of a volume action, send a GET request to /v2/volumes/$VOLUME_ID/actions/$ACTION_ID.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          volume_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          string <uuid>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Example: 7724db7c-e098-11e5-b522-000f53304e51

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The ID of the block storage volume.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          action_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          integer >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Example: 36804636

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A unique numeric ID that can be used to identify and reference an action.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          query Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          per_page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          integer [ 1 .. 200 ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Default: 20
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Example: per_page=2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Number of items returned per page

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          integer >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Default: 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Example: page=1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Which 'page' of paginated results to return.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/volumes/{volume_id}/actions/{action_id}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/volumes/7724db7c-e098-11e5-b522-000f53304e51/actions/72531856"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Example
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          volume_action_attach_response
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "action": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "id": 72531856,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "status": "completed",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "type": "attach_volume",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "started_at": "2020-11-12T17:51:03Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "completed_at": "2020-11-12T17:51:14Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "resource_type": "volume",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "region": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "region_slug": "nyc1"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            CDN Endpoints

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Content hosted in DigitalOcean's object storage solution, Spaces, can optionally be served by our globally distributed Content Delivery Network (CDN). By sending requests to /v2/cdn/endpoints, you can list, create, or delete CDN Endpoints as well as purge cached content. To use a custom subdomain to access the CDN Endpoint, provide the ID of a DigitalOcean managed TLS certificate and the fully qualified domain name for the custom subdomain.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            List All CDN Endpoints

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            To list all of the CDN endpoints available on your account, send a GET request to /v2/cdn/endpoints.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            query Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            per_page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            integer [ 1 .. 200 ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Default: 20
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Example: per_page=2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Number of items returned per page

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            integer >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Default: 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Example: page=1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Which 'page' of paginated results to return.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/cdn/endpoints

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/cdn/endpoints"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "endpoints": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "links": { },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "meta": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "total": 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Create a New CDN Endpoint

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              To create a new CDN endpoint, send a POST request to /v2/cdn/endpoints. The origin attribute must be set to the fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of a DigitalOcean Space. Optionally, the TTL may be configured by setting the ttl attribute.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A custom subdomain may be configured by specifying the custom_domain and certificate_id attributes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              origin
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              string <hostname>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The fully qualified domain name (FQDN) for the origin server which provides the content for the CDN. This is currently restricted to a Space.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ttl
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              integer
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Default: 3600
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enum: 60 600 3600 86400 604800

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The amount of time the content is cached by the CDN's edge servers in seconds. TTL must be one of 60, 600, 3600, 86400, or 604800. Defaults to 3600 (one hour) when excluded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              certificate_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              string <uuid>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The ID of a DigitalOcean managed TLS certificate used for SSL when a custom subdomain is provided.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              custom_domain
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              string <hostname>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the custom subdomain used with the CDN endpoint.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/cdn/endpoints

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Example
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              CDN Endpoint
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "origin": "static-images.nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "ttl": 3600
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 201
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Example
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              CDN Endpoint
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "endpoint": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "id": "19f06b6a-3ace-4315-b086-499a0e521b76",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "origin": "static-images.nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "endpoint": "static-images.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "created_at": "2018-07-19T15:04:16Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "ttl": 3600
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve an Existing CDN Endpoint

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              To show information about an existing CDN endpoint, send a GET request to /v2/cdn/endpoints/$ENDPOINT_ID.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              cdn_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              string <uuid> >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Example: 19f06b6a-3ace-4315-b086-499a0e521b76
