                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A unique identifier for a CDN endpoint.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/cdn/endpoints/{cdn_id}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/cdn/endpoints/19f06b6a-3ace-4315-b086-499a0e521b76"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Example
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              CDN Endpoint
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "endpoint": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "id": "19f06b6a-3ace-4315-b086-499a0e521b76",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "origin": "static-images.nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "endpoint": "static-images.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "created_at": "2018-07-19T15:04:16Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "ttl": 3600
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Update a CDN Endpoint

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              To update the TTL, certificate ID, or the FQDN of the custom subdomain for an existing CDN endpoint, send a PUT request to /v2/cdn/endpoints/$ENDPOINT_ID.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              cdn_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              string <uuid> >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Example: 19f06b6a-3ace-4315-b086-499a0e521b76

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A unique identifier for a CDN endpoint.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ttl
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              integer
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Default: 3600
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enum: 60 600 3600 86400 604800

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The amount of time the content is cached by the CDN's edge servers in seconds. TTL must be one of 60, 600, 3600, 86400, or 604800. Defaults to 3600 (one hour) when excluded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              certificate_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              string <uuid>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The ID of a DigitalOcean managed TLS certificate used for SSL when a custom subdomain is provided.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              custom_domain
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              string <hostname>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the custom subdomain used with the CDN endpoint.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/cdn/endpoints/{cdn_id}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "ttl": 3600,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "certificate_id": "892071a0-bb95-49bc-8021-3afd67a210bf",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "custom_domain": "static.example.com"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Example
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              CDN Endpoint
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "endpoint": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "id": "19f06b6a-3ace-4315-b086-499a0e521b76",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "origin": "static-images.nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "endpoint": "static-images.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "created_at": "2018-07-19T15:04:16Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "ttl": 3600
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Delete a CDN Endpoint

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              To delete a specific CDN endpoint, send a DELETE request to /v2/cdn/endpoints/$ENDPOINT_ID.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A status of 204 will be given. This indicates that the request was processed successfully, but that no response body is needed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              cdn_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              string <uuid> >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Example: 19f06b6a-3ace-4315-b086-499a0e521b76

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A unique identifier for a CDN endpoint.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/cdn/endpoints/{cdn_id}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              curl -X DELETE \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/cdn/endpoints/19f06b6a-3ace-4315-b086-499a0e521b76"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "id": "unauthorized",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "message": "Unable to authenticate you."
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Purge the Cache for an Existing CDN Endpoint

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              To purge cached content from a CDN endpoint, send a DELETE request to /v2/cdn/endpoints/$ENDPOINT_ID/cache. The body of the request should include a files attribute containing a list of cached file paths to be purged. A path may be for a single file or may contain a wildcard (*) to recursively purge all files under a directory. When only a wildcard is provided, all cached files will be purged.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              cdn_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              string <uuid> >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Example: 19f06b6a-3ace-4315-b086-499a0e521b76

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A unique identifier for a CDN endpoint.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              files
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Array of strings

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              An array of strings containing the path to the content to be purged from the CDN cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/cdn/endpoints/{cdn_id}/cache

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "files": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "path/to/image.png",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "path/to/css/*"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "id": "unauthorized",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "message": "Unable to authenticate you."
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Certificates

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In order to perform SSL termination on load balancers, DigitalOcean offers two types of SSL certificate management:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Custom: User-generated certificates may be uploaded to DigitalOcean where they will be placed in a fully encrypted and isolated storage system.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Let's Encrypt: Certificates may be automatically generated by DigitalOcean utilizing an integration with Let's Encrypt, the free and open certificate authority. These certificates will also be automatically renewed as required.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              List All Certificates

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              To list all of the certificates available on your account, send a GET request to /v2/certificates.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              query Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              per_page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              integer [ 1 .. 200 ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Default: 20
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Example: per_page=2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of items returned per page

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              integer >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Default: 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Example: page=1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Which 'page' of paginated results to return.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/certificates

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/certificates"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "certificates": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "links": { },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "meta": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "total": 2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Create a New Certificate

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  To upload new SSL certificate which you have previously generated, send a POST request to /v2/certificates.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  When uploading a user-generated certificate, the private_key, leaf_certificate, and optionally the certificate_chain attributes should be provided. The type must be set to custom.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  When using Let's Encrypt to create a certificate, the dns_names attribute must be provided, and the type must be set to lets_encrypt.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  One of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  A unique human-readable name referring to a certificate.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Enum: "custom" "lets_encrypt"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  A string representing the type of the certificate. The value will be custom for a user-uploaded certificate or lets_encrypt for one automatically generated with Let's Encrypt.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  dns_names
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Array of strings

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  An array of fully qualified domain names (FQDNs) for which the certificate was issued. A certificate covering all subdomains can be issued using a wildcard (e.g. *.example.com).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/certificates

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Example
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Let's Encrypt Certificate Request
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "name": "web-cert-01",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "type": "lets_encrypt",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "dns_names": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "www.example.com",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "example.com"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 201
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Example
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Custom Certificate
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "certificate": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "id": "892071a0-bb95-49bc-8021-3afd67a210bf",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "name": "web-cert-01",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "not_after": "2017-02-22T00:23:00Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "sha1_fingerprint": "dfcc9f57d86bf58e321c2c6c31c7a971be244ac7",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "created_at": "2017-02-08T16:02:37Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "dns_names": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "state": "verified",
