                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              read_write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              boolean
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Default: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Example: read_write=true

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              By default, the registry credentials allow for read-only access. Set this query parameter to true to obtain read-write credentials.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/registry/docker-credentials

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/registry/docker-credentials"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "auths": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "registry.digitalocean.com": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Validate a Container Registry Name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                To validate that a container registry name is available for use, send a POST request to /v2/registry/validate-name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                If the name is both formatted correctly and available, the response code will be 204 and contain no body. If the name is already in use, the response will be a 409 Conflict.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                string <= 63 characters ^[a-z0-9-]{1,63}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                A globally unique name for the container registry. Must be lowercase and be composed only of numbers, letters and -, up to a limit of 63 characters.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/registry/validate-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "name": "example"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 409
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "id": "unauthorized",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "message": "Unable to authenticate you."
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                List All Container Registry Repositories Deprecated

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                This endpoint has been deprecated in favor of the List All Container Registry Repositories [V2] endpoint.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                To list all repositories in your container registry, send a GET request to /v2/registry/$REGISTRY_NAME/repositories.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                registry_name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Example: example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                The name of a container registry.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                query Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                per_page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                integer [ 1 .. 200 ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Default: 20
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Example: per_page=2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Number of items returned per page

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                integer >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Default: 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Example: page=1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Which 'page' of paginated results to return.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/registry/{registry_name}/repositories

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/registry/example/repositories"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "repositories": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "meta": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "total": 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  List All Container Registry Repositories (V2)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  To list all repositories in your container registry, send a GET request to /v2/registry/$REGISTRY_NAME/repositoriesV2.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  registry_name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Example: example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The name of a container registry.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  query Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  per_page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  integer [ 1 .. 200 ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Default: 20
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Example: per_page=2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Number of items returned per page

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  integer >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Default: 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Example: page=1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Which 'page' of paginated results to return. Ignored when 'page_token' is provided.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  page_token
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Example: page_token=eyJUb2tlbiI6IkNnZGpiMjlz

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Token to retrieve of the next or previous set of results more quickly than using 'page'.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/registry/{registry_name}/repositoriesV2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • cURL (next page)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/registry/example/repositoriesV2?page_size=1"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 400
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "repositories": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "meta": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "total": 5
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "links": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "pages": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      List All Container Registry Repository Tags

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      To list all tags in your container registry repository, send a GET request to /v2/registry/$REGISTRY_NAME/repositories/$REPOSITORY_NAME/tags.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Note that if your repository name contains / characters, it must be URL-encoded in the request URL. For example, to list tags for registry.digitalocean.com/example/my/repo, the path would be /v2/registry/example/repositories/my%2Frepo/tags.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      registry_name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Example: example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The name of a container registry.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      repository_name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Example: repo-1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The name of a container registry repository. If the name contains / characters, they must be URL-encoded, e.g. %2F.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      query Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      per_page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      integer [ 1 .. 200 ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Default: 20
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Example: per_page=2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Number of items returned per page

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      integer >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Default: 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Example: page=1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Which 'page' of paginated results to return.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/registry/{registry_name}/{repository_name}/tags

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/registry/example/repositories/repo-1/tags"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "tags": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "meta": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "total": 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Delete Container Registry Repository Tag

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        To delete a container repository tag, send a DELETE request to /v2/registry/$REGISTRY_NAME/repositories/$REPOSITORY_NAME/tags/$TAG.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Note that if your repository name contains / characters, it must be URL-encoded in the request URL. For example, to delete registry.digitalocean.com/example/my/repo:mytag, the path would be /v2/registry/example/repositories/my%2Frepo/tags/mytag.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        A successful request will receive a 204 status code with no body in response. This indicates that the request was processed successfully.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        registry_name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example: example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The name of a container registry.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        repository_name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example: repo-1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The name of a container registry repository. If the name contains / characters, they must be URL-encoded, e.g. %2F.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        repository_tag
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example: 06a447a

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The name of a container registry repository tag.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/registry/{registry_name}/{repository_name}/tags/{repository_tag}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        curl -X DELETE \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/registry/example/repositories/repo-1/tags/mytag"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "id": "unauthorized",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "message": "Unable to authenticate you."
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        List All Container Registry Repository Manifests
