                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        To list all manifests in your container registry repository, send a GET request to /v2/registry/$REGISTRY_NAME/repositories/$REPOSITORY_NAME/digests.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Note that if your repository name contains / characters, it must be URL-encoded in the request URL. For example, to list manifests for registry.digitalocean.com/example/my/repo, the path would be /v2/registry/example/repositories/my%2Frepo/digests.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        registry_name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example: example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The name of a container registry.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        repository_name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example: repo-1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The name of a container registry repository. If the name contains / characters, they must be URL-encoded, e.g. %2F.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        query Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        per_page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        integer [ 1 .. 200 ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Default: 20
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example: per_page=2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Number of items returned per page

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        integer >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Default: 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example: page=1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Which 'page' of paginated results to return.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/registry/{registry_name}/{repository_name}/digests

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/registry/example/repositories/repo-1/digests"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "manifests": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "meta": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "total": 3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "links": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "pages": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Delete Container Registry Repository Manifest

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            To delete a container repository manifest by digest, send a DELETE request to /v2/registry/$REGISTRY_NAME/repositories/$REPOSITORY_NAME/digests/$MANIFEST_DIGEST.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Note that if your repository name contains / characters, it must be URL-encoded in the request URL. For example, to delete registry.digitalocean.com/example/my/repo@sha256:abcd, the path would be /v2/registry/example/repositories/my%2Frepo/digests/sha256:abcd.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            A successful request will receive a 204 status code with no body in response. This indicates that the request was processed successfully.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            registry_name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Example: example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            The name of a container registry.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            repository_name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Example: repo-1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            The name of a container registry repository. If the name contains / characters, they must be URL-encoded, e.g. %2F.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            manifest_digest
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Example: sha256:cb8a924afdf0229ef7515d9e5b3024e23b3eb03ddbba287f4a19c6ac90b8d221

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            The manifest digest of a container registry repository tag.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/registry/{registry_name}/{repository_name}/digests/{manifest_digest}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            curl -X DELETE \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/registry/example/repositories/repo-1/digests/sha256:cb8a924afdf0229ef7515d9e5b3024e23b3eb03ddbba287f4a19c6ac90b8d221"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "id": "unauthorized",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "message": "Unable to authenticate you."
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Start Garbage Collection

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Garbage collection enables users to clear out unreferenced blobs (layer & manifest data) after deleting one or more manifests from a repository. If there are no unreferenced blobs resulting from the deletion of one or more manifests, garbage collection is effectively a noop. See here for more information about how and why you should clean up your container registry periodically.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            To request a garbage collection run on your registry, send a POST request to /v2/registry/$REGISTRY_NAME/garbage-collection. This will initiate the following sequence of events on your registry.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Set the registry to read-only mode, meaning no further write-scoped JWTs will be issued to registry clients. Existing write-scoped JWTs will continue to work until they expire which can take up to 15 minutes.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Wait until all existing write-scoped JWTs have expired.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Scan all registry manifests to determine which blobs are unreferenced.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Delete all unreferenced blobs from the registry.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Record the number of blobs deleted and bytes freed, mark the garbage collection status as success.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Remove the read-only mode restriction from the registry, meaning write-scoped JWTs will once again be issued to registry clients.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            registry_name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Example: example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            The name of a container registry.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/registry/{registry_name}/garbage-collection

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            curl -X POST \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/registry/example/garbage-collection"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 201
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "garbage_collection": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "uuid": "eff0feee-49c7-4e8f-ba5c-a320c109c8a8",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "registry_name": "example",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "status": "requested",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "created_at": "2020-10-30T21:03:24Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "updated_at": "2020-10-30T21:03:44Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "blobs_deleted": 42,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "freed_bytes": 667
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Get Active Garbage Collection

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            To get information about the currently-active garbage collection for a registry, send a GET request to /v2/registry/$REGISTRY_NAME/garbage-collection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            registry_name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Example: example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            The name of a container registry.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/registry/{registry_name}/garbage-collection

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/registry/example/garbage-collection"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "garbage_collection": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "uuid": "eff0feee-49c7-4e8f-ba5c-a320c109c8a8",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "registry_name": "example",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "status": "requested",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "created_at": "2020-10-30T21:03:24Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "updated_at": "2020-10-30T21:03:44Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "blobs_deleted": 42,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "freed_bytes": 667
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            List Garbage Collections

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            To get information about past garbage collections for a registry, send a GET request to /v2/registry/$REGISTRY_NAME/garbage-collections.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            registry_name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Example: example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            The name of a container registry.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            query Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            per_page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            integer [ 1 .. 200 ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Default: 20
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Example: per_page=2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Number of items returned per page

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            integer >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Default: 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Example: page=1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Which 'page' of paginated results to return.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/registry/{registry_name}/garbage-collections

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/registry/example/garbage-collections"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "garbage_collections": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "meta": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "total": 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Update Garbage Collection

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              To cancel the currently-active garbage collection for a registry, send a PUT request to /v2/registry/$REGISTRY_NAME/garbage-collection/$GC_UUID and specify one or more of the attributes below.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              registry_name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Example: example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of a container registry.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              garbage_collection_uuid
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Example: eff0feee-49c7-4e8f-ba5c-a320c109c8a8

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The UUID of a garbage collection run.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              boolean

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A boolean value indicating that the garbage collection should be cancelled.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/registry/{registry_name}/garbage-collection/{garbage_collection_uuid}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request samples
