                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "num_nodes": 2,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "tags": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "production"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 201
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "database": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "id": "9cc10173-e9ea-4176-9dbc-a4cee4c4ff30",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "name": "backend",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "engine": "pg",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "version": "14",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "connection": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "private_connection": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "users": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "db_names": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "num_nodes": 2,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "region": "nyc3",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "status": "creating",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "created_at": "2019-01-11T18:37:36Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "maintenance_window": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "size": "db-s-2vcpu-4gb",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "tags": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "private_network_uuid": "d455e75d-4858-4eec-8c95-da2f0a5f93a7",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "version_end_of_life": "2023-11-09T00:00:00Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "version_end_of_availability": "2023-05-09T00:00:00Z"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Retrieve an Existing Database Cluster

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                To show information about an existing database cluster, send a GET request to /v2/databases/$DATABASE_ID. The response will be a JSON object with a database key. This will be set to an object containing the standard database cluster attributes. The embedded connection and private_connection objects will contain the information needed to access the database cluster. The embedded maintenance_window object will contain information about any scheduled maintenance for the database cluster.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                database_cluster_uuid
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                string <uuid>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Example: 9cc10173-e9ea-4176-9dbc-a4cee4c4ff30

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                A unique identifier for a database cluster.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/databases/{database_cluster_uuid}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/databases/9cc10173-e9ea-4176-9dbc-a4cee4c4ff30"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "database": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "id": "9cc10173-e9ea-4176-9dbc-a4cee4c4ff30",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "name": "backend",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "engine": "pg",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "version": "14",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "connection": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "private_connection": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "users": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "db_names": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "num_nodes": 2,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "region": "nyc3",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "status": "creating",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "created_at": "2019-01-11T18:37:36Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "maintenance_window": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "size": "db-s-2vcpu-4gb",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "tags": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "private_network_uuid": "d455e75d-4858-4eec-8c95-da2f0a5f93a7",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "version_end_of_life": "2023-11-09T00:00:00Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "version_end_of_availability": "2023-05-09T00:00:00Z"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Destroy a Database Cluster

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            To destroy a specific database, send a DELETE request to /v2/databases/$DATABASE_ID. A status of 204 will be given. This indicates that the request was processed successfully, but that no response body is needed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            database_cluster_uuid
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            string <uuid>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Example: 9cc10173-e9ea-4176-9dbc-a4cee4c4ff30

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            A unique identifier for a database cluster.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/databases/{database_cluster_uuid}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            curl -X DELETE \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
"https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/databases/9cc10173-e9ea-4176-9dbc-a4cee4c4ff30"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "id": "unauthorized",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "message": "Unable to authenticate you."
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Retrieve an Existing Database Cluster Configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Shows configuration parameters for an existing database cluster by sending a GET request to /v2/databases/$DATABASE_ID/config. The response is a JSON object with a config key, which is set to an object containing any database configuration parameters.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            database_cluster_uuid
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            string <uuid>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Example: 9cc10173-e9ea-4176-9dbc-a4cee4c4ff30

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            A unique identifier for a database cluster.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/databases/{database_cluster_uuid}/config

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/databases/9cc10173-e9ea-4176-9dbc-a4cee4c4ff30/config"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "config": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "sql_mode": "ANSI,ERROR_FOR_DIVISION_BY_ZERO,NO_ENGINE_SUBSTITUTION,NO_ZERO_DATE,NO_ZERO_IN_DATE,STRICT_ALL_TABLES",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "sql_require_primary_key": true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Update the Database Configuration for an Existing Database

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            To update the configuration for an existing database cluster, send a PATCH request to /v2/databases/$DATABASE_ID/config.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            database_cluster_uuid
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            string <uuid>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Example: 9cc10173-e9ea-4176-9dbc-a4cee4c4ff30

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            A unique identifier for a database cluster.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            mysql (object) or postgres (object) or redis (object)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/databases/{database_cluster_uuid}/config

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "config": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "sql_mode": "ANSI,ERROR_FOR_DIVISION_BY_ZERO,NO_ENGINE_SUBSTITUTION,NO_ZERO_DATE,NO_ZERO_IN_DATE,STRICT_ALL_TABLES",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "sql_require_primary_key": true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "id": "unauthorized",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "message": "Unable to authenticate you."
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Retrieve the Public Certificate

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            To retrieve the public certificate used to secure the connection to the database cluster send a GET request to /v2/databases/$DATABASE_ID/ca.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            The response will be a JSON object with a ca key. This will be set to an object containing the base64 encoding of the public key certificate.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            database_cluster_uuid
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            string <uuid>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Example: 9cc10173-e9ea-4176-9dbc-a4cee4c4ff30

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            A unique identifier for a database cluster.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/databases/{database_cluster_uuid}/ca

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/databases/9cc10173-e9ea-4176-9dbc-a4cee4c4ff30/ca"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 401
