                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Example: 9cc10173-e9ea-4176-9dbc-a4cee4c4ff30

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A unique identifier for a database cluster.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A unique name for the connection pool. Must be between 3 and 60 characters.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mode
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The PGBouncer transaction mode for the connection pool. The allowed values are session, transaction, and statement.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      size
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      integer <int32>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The desired size of the PGBouncer connection pool. The maximum allowed size is determined by the size of the cluster's primary node. 25 backend server connections are allowed for every 1GB of RAM. Three are reserved for maintenance. For example, a primary node with 1 GB of RAM allows for a maximum of 22 backend server connections while one with 4 GB would allow for 97. Note that these are shared across all connection pools in a cluster.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      db
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The database for use with the connection pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      user
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The name of the user for use with the connection pool. When excluded, all sessions connect to the database as the inbound user.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/databases/{database_cluster_uuid}/pools

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "name": "backend-pool",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "mode": "transaction",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "size": 10,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "db": "defaultdb",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "user": "doadmin"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 201
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "pool": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "user": "doadmin",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "name": "backend-pool",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "size": 10,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "db": "defaultdb",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "mode": "transaction",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "connection": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Retrieve Existing Connection Pool (PostgreSQL)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        To show information about an existing connection pool for a PostgreSQL database cluster, send a GET request to /v2/databases/$DATABASE_ID/pools/$POOL_NAME. The response will be a JSON object with a pool key.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        database_cluster_uuid
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        string <uuid>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example: 9cc10173-e9ea-4176-9dbc-a4cee4c4ff30

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        A unique identifier for a database cluster.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        pool_name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example: backend-pool

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The name used to identify the connection pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/databases/{database_cluster_uuid}/pools/{pool_name}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        curl -X GET /
-H "Content-Type: application/json" /
-H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" /
"https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/databases/9cc10173-e9ea-4176-9dbc-a4cee4c4ff30/pools/backend-pool"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "pool": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "user": "doadmin",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "name": "backend-pool",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "size": 10,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "db": "defaultdb",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "mode": "transaction",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "connection": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Update Connection Pools (PostgreSQL)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          To update a connection pool for a PostgreSQL database cluster, send a PUT request to /v2/databases/$DATABASE_ID/pools/$POOL_NAME.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          database_cluster_uuid
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          string <uuid>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Example: 9cc10173-e9ea-4176-9dbc-a4cee4c4ff30

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A unique identifier for a database cluster.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          pool_name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Example: backend-pool

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The name used to identify the connection pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          mode
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The PGBouncer transaction mode for the connection pool. The allowed values are session, transaction, and statement.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          size
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          integer <int32>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The desired size of the PGBouncer connection pool. The maximum allowed size is determined by the size of the cluster's primary node. 25 backend server connections are allowed for every 1GB of RAM. Three are reserved for maintenance. For example, a primary node with 1 GB of RAM allows for a maximum of 22 backend server connections while one with 4 GB would allow for 97. Note that these are shared across all connection pools in a cluster.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          db
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The database for use with the connection pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          user
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The name of the user for use with the connection pool. When excluded, all sessions connect to the database as the inbound user.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/databases/{database_cluster_uuid}/pools/{pool_name}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "mode": "transaction",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "size": 10,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "db": "defaultdb",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "user": "doadmin"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "id": "unauthorized",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "message": "Unable to authenticate you."
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Delete a Connection Pool (PostgreSQL)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          To delete a specific connection pool for a PostgreSQL database cluster, send a DELETE request to /v2/databases/$DATABASE_ID/pools/$POOL_NAME.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A status of 204 will be given. This indicates that the request was processed successfully, but that no response body is needed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          database_cluster_uuid
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          string <uuid>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Example: 9cc10173-e9ea-4176-9dbc-a4cee4c4ff30

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A unique identifier for a database cluster.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          pool_name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Example: backend-pool

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The name used to identify the connection pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/databases/{database_cluster_uuid}/pools/{pool_name}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
"https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/databases/9cc10173-e9ea-4176-9dbc-a4cee4c4ff30/pools/backend-pool"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          application/json
