                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Firewalls

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    DigitalOcean Cloud Firewalls provide the ability to restrict network access to and from a Droplet allowing you to define which ports will accept inbound or outbound connections. By sending requests to the /v2/firewalls endpoint, you can list, create, or delete firewalls as well as modify access rules.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    List All Firewalls

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    To list all of the firewalls available on your account, send a GET request to /v2/firewalls.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    query Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    per_page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    integer [ 1 .. 200 ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Default: 20
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Example: per_page=2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Number of items returned per page

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    integer >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Default: 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Example: page=1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Which 'page' of paginated results to return.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/firewalls

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/firewalls"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "firewalls": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "links": { },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "meta": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "total": 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Create a New Firewall

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      To create a new firewall, send a POST request to /v2/firewalls. The request must contain at least one inbound or outbound access rule.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Any of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string^[a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9\.-]+$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A human-readable name for a firewall. The name must begin with an alphanumeric character. Subsequent characters must either be alphanumeric characters, a period (.), or a dash (-).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      droplet_ids
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Array of integers Nullable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      An array containing the IDs of the Droplets assigned to the firewall.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      tags
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Array of strings Nullable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A flat array of tag names as strings to be applied to the resource. Tag names may be for either existing or new tags.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Array of objects Nullable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Array of objects Nullable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/firewalls

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "name": "firewall",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "inbound_rules": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "outbound_rules": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "droplet_ids": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 8043964
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 202
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 400
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "firewall": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "id": "bb4b2611-3d72-467b-8602-280330ecd65c",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "name": "firewall",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "status": "waiting",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "inbound_rules": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "outbound_rules": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "created_at": "2017-05-23T21:24:00Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "droplet_ids": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "tags": [ ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "pending_changes": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Retrieve an Existing Firewall

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    To show information about an existing firewall, send a GET request to /v2/firewalls/$FIREWALL_ID.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    firewall_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    string <uuid>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Example: bb4b2611-3d72-467b-8602-280330ecd65c

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    A unique ID that can be used to identify and reference a firewall.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/firewalls/{firewall_id}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/firewalls/bb4b2611-3d72-467b-8602-280330ecd65c"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "firewall": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "id": "bb4b2611-3d72-467b-8602-280330ecd65c",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "name": "firewall",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "status": "succeeded",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "inbound_rules": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "outbound_rules": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "created_at": "2017-05-23T21:24:00Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "droplet_ids": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "tags": [ ],
