                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "pending_changes": [ ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Update a Firewall

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          To update the configuration of an existing firewall, send a PUT request to /v2/firewalls/$FIREWALL_ID. The request should contain a full representation of the firewall including existing attributes. Note that any attributes that are not provided will be reset to their default values.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          firewall_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          string <uuid>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Example: bb4b2611-3d72-467b-8602-280330ecd65c

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A unique ID that can be used to identify and reference a firewall.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Any of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          string^[a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9\.-]+$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A human-readable name for a firewall. The name must begin with an alphanumeric character. Subsequent characters must either be alphanumeric characters, a period (.), or a dash (-).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          droplet_ids
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Array of integers Nullable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          An array containing the IDs of the Droplets assigned to the firewall.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          tags
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Array of strings Nullable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A flat array of tag names as strings to be applied to the resource. Tag names may be for either existing or new tags.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Array of objects Nullable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Array of objects Nullable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/firewalls/{firewall_id}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "name": "frontend-firewall",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "inbound_rules": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "outbound_rules": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "droplet_ids": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 8043964
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "tags": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "frontend"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 400
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "firewall": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "id": "bb4b2611-3d72-467b-8602-280330ecd65c",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "name": "frontend-firewall",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "inbound_rules": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "outbound_rules": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "created_at": "2020-05-23T21:24:00Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "droplet_ids": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "tags": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "status": "waiting",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "pending_changes": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Delete a Firewall

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          To delete a firewall send a DELETE request to /v2/firewalls/$FIREWALL_ID.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          No response body will be sent back, but the response code will indicate success. Specifically, the response code will be a 204, which means that the action was successful with no returned body data.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          firewall_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          string <uuid>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Example: bb4b2611-3d72-467b-8602-280330ecd65c

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A unique ID that can be used to identify and reference a firewall.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/firewalls/{firewall_id}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          curl -X DELETE \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/firewalls/bb4b2611-3d72-467b-8602-280330ecd65c"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "id": "unauthorized",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "message": "Unable to authenticate you."
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Add Droplets to a Firewall

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          To assign a Droplet to a firewall, send a POST request to /v2/firewalls/$FIREWALL_ID/droplets. In the body of the request, there should be a droplet_ids attribute containing a list of Droplet IDs.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          No response body will be sent back, but the response code will indicate success. Specifically, the response code will be a 204, which means that the action was successful with no returned body data.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          firewall_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          string <uuid>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Example: bb4b2611-3d72-467b-8602-280330ecd65c

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A unique ID that can be used to identify and reference a firewall.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          droplet_ids
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Array of integers

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          An array containing the IDs of the Droplets to be assigned to the firewall.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/firewalls/{firewall_id}/droplets

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "droplet_ids": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 49696269
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
