                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          firewall_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          string <uuid>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Example: bb4b2611-3d72-467b-8602-280330ecd65c

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A unique ID that can be used to identify and reference a firewall.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Any of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Array of objects Nullable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Array of objects Nullable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/firewalls/{firewall_id}/rules

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "inbound_rules": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "outbound_rules": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 400
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "id": "bad_request",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "message": "error parsing request body",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "request_id": "4851a473-1621-42ea-b2f9-5071c0ea8414"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove Rules from a Firewall

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              To remove access rules from a firewall, send a DELETE request to /v2/firewalls/$FIREWALL_ID/rules. The body of the request may include an inbound_rules and/or outbound_rules attribute containing an array of rules to be removed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              No response body will be sent back, but the response code will indicate success. Specifically, the response code will be a 204, which means that the action was successful with no returned body data.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              firewall_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              string <uuid>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Example: bb4b2611-3d72-467b-8602-280330ecd65c

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A unique ID that can be used to identify and reference a firewall.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Any of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Array of objects Nullable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Array of objects Nullable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/firewalls/{firewall_id}/rules

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "inbound_rules": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "outbound_rules": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 400
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "id": "bad_request",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "message": "error parsing request body",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "request_id": "4851a473-1621-42ea-b2f9-5071c0ea8414"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Floating IP Actions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  As of 16 June 2022, we have renamed the Floating IP product to Reserved IPs. The Reserved IP product's endpoints function the exact same way as Floating IPs. The only difference is the name change throughout the URLs and fields. For example, the floating_ips field is now the reserved_ips field. The Floating IP endpoints will remain active until fall 2023 before being permanently deprecated.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  With the exception of the Projects API, we will reflect this change as an additional field in the responses across the API where the floating_ip field is used. For example, the Droplet metadata response will contain the field reserved_ips in addition to the floating_ips field. Floating IPs retrieved using the Projects API will retain the original name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Floating IP actions are commands that can be given to a DigitalOcean floating IP. These requests are made on the actions endpoint of a specific floating IP.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  An action object is returned. These objects hold the current status of the requested action.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  List All Actions for a Floating IP

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  To retrieve all actions that have been executed on a floating IP, send a GET request to /v2/floating_ips/$FLOATING_IP/actions.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  floating_ip
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  string <ipv4> >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Example: 45.55.96.47

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  A floating IP address.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/floating_ips/{floating_ip}/actions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/floating_ips/45.55.96.47/actions?page=1&per_page=1"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "actions": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "links": { },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "meta": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "total": 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Initiate a Floating IP Action

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    To initiate an action on a floating IP send a POST request to /v2/floating_ips/$FLOATING_IP/actions. In the JSON body to the request, set the type attribute to on of the supported action types:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Action Details
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    assign Assigns a floating IP to a Droplet
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    unassign Unassign a floating IP from a Droplet
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Authorizations:
