                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    floating_ip
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    string <ipv4> >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Example: 45.55.96.47

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    A floating IP address.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Request Body schema: application/json

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    The type attribute set in the request body will specify the action that will be taken on the floating IP.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    The type of action to initiate for the floating IP.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    unassign

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/floating_ips/{floating_ip}/actions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Example
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    unassign
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "type": "unassign"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 201
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "action": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "id": 72531856,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "status": "completed",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "type": "assign_ip",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "started_at": "2015-11-12T17:51:03Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "completed_at": "2015-11-12T17:51:14Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "resource_id": 758604968,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "resource_type": "floating_ip",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "region": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "region_slug": "nyc3",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "project_id": "746c6152-2fa2-11ed-92d3-27aaa54e4988"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve an Existing Floating IP Action

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      To retrieve the status of a floating IP action, send a GET request to /v2/floating_ips/$FLOATING_IP/actions/$ACTION_ID.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      floating_ip
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string <ipv4> >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Example: 45.55.96.47

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A floating IP address.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      action_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      integer >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Example: 36804636

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A unique numeric ID that can be used to identify and reference an action.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/floating_ips/{floating_ip}/actions/{action_id}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/floating_ips/45.55.96.47/actions/72531856"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "action": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "id": 72531856,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "status": "completed",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "type": "assign_ip",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "started_at": "2015-11-12T17:51:03Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "completed_at": "2015-11-12T17:51:14Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "resource_id": 758604968,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "resource_type": "floating_ip",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "region": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "region_slug": "nyc3",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "project_id": "746c6152-2fa2-11ed-92d3-27aaa54e4988"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Floating IPs

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        As of 16 June 2022, we have renamed the Floating IP product to Reserved IPs. The Reserved IP product's endpoints function the exact same way as Floating IPs. The only difference is the name change throughout the URLs and fields. For example, the floating_ips field is now the reserved_ips field. The Floating IP endpoints will remain active until fall 2023 before being permanently deprecated.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        With the exception of the Projects API, we will reflect this change as an additional field in the responses across the API where the floating_ip field is used. For example, the Droplet metadata response will contain the field reserved_ips in addition to the floating_ips field. Floating IPs retrieved using the Projects API will retain the original name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        DigitalOcean Floating IPs are publicly-accessible static IP addresses that can be mapped to one of your Droplets. They can be used to create highly available setups or other configurations requiring movable addresses.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Floating IPs are bound to a specific region.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        List All Floating IPs

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        To list all of the floating IPs available on your account, send a GET request to /v2/floating_ips.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        query Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        per_page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        integer [ 1 .. 200 ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Default: 20
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example: per_page=2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Number of items returned per page

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        page
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        integer >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Default: 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example: page=1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Which 'page' of paginated results to return.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/floating_ips

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/floating_ips?page=1&per_page=20"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "floating_ips": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "links": { },
