                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "meta": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "total": 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Create a New Floating IP

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          On creation, a floating IP must be either assigned to a Droplet or reserved to a region.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • To create a new floating IP assigned to a Droplet, send a POST request to /v2/floating_ips with the droplet_id attribute.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • To create a new floating IP reserved to a region, send a POST request to /v2/floating_ips with the region attribute.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Note: In addition to the standard rate limiting, only 12 floating IPs may be created per 60 seconds.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          One of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          droplet_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          integer

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The ID of the Droplet that the floating IP will be assigned to.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/floating_ips

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Example
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Assign to Droplet
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "droplet_id": 2457247
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 202
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Example
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Assigning to Droplet
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "floating_ip": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "ip": "45.55.96.47",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "droplet": null,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "region": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "locked": true,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "project_id": "746c6152-2fa2-11ed-92d3-27aaa54e4988"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "links": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "droplets": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "actions": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Retrieve an Existing Floating IP

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                To show information about a floating IP, send a GET request to /v2/floating_ips/$FLOATING_IP_ADDR.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                floating_ip
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                string <ipv4> >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Example: 45.55.96.47

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                A floating IP address.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/floating_ips/{floating_ip}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/floating_ips/45.55.96.47"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 429

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Example
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Assigned to Droplet
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "floating_ip": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "ip": "45.55.96.47",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "droplet": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "region": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "locked": false,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "project_id": "746c6152-2fa2-11ed-92d3-27aaa54e4988"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Delete a Floating IP

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    To delete a floating IP and remove it from your account, send a DELETE request to /v2/floating_ips/$FLOATING_IP_ADDR.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    A successful request will receive a 204 status code with no body in response. This indicates that the request was processed successfully.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    floating_ip
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    string <ipv4> >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Example: 45.55.96.47

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    A floating IP address.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/floating_ips/{floating_ip}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    curl -X DELETE \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/floating_ips/45.55.96.47"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 404

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "id": "unauthorized",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "message": "Unable to authenticate you."
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Functions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Serverless functions are blocks of code that run on demand without the need to manage any infrastructure. You can develop functions on your local machine and then deploy them to a namespace using doctl, the official DigitalOcean CLI tool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    The Serverless Functions API currently only supports creating and managing namespaces.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    List Namespaces

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Returns a list of namespaces associated with the current user. To get all namespaces, send a GET request to /v2/functions/namespaces.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    bearer_auth (read)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/functions/namespaces

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    curl -X GET \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/functions/namespaces"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 429
