                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "namespaces": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Create Namespace

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Creates a new serverless functions namespace in the desired region and associates it with the provided label. A namespace is a collection of functions and their associated packages, triggers, and project specifications. To create a namespace, send a POST request to /v2/functions/namespaces with the region and label properties.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      region
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The datacenter region in which to create the namespace.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      label
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The namespace's unique name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/functions/namespaces

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "region": "nyc1",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "label": "my namespace"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 422
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "namespace": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "api_host": "https://api_host.io",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "namespace": "fn-xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "created_at": "2022-09-14T04:16:45Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "updated_at": "2022-09-14T04:16:45Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "label": "my namespace",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "region": "nyc1",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "uuid": "xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "key": "d1zcd455h01mqjfs4s2eaewyejehi5f2uj4etqq3h7cera8iwkub6xg5of1wdde2"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Get Namespace

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Gets the namespace details for the given namespace UUID. To get namespace details, send a GET request to /v2/functions/namespaces/$NAMESPACE_ID with no parameters.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      namespace_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Example: fn-xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The ID of the namespace to be managed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/functions/namespaces/{namespace_id}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      curl -X GET \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/functions/namespaces/{{namespace_id}}"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 403
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "namespace": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "api_host": "https://api_host.io",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "namespace": "fn-xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "created_at": "2022-09-14T04:16:45Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "updated_at": "2022-09-14T04:16:45Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "label": "my namespace",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "region": "nyc1",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "uuid": "xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "key": "d1zcd455h01mqjfs4s2eaewyejehi5f2uj4etqq3h7cera8iwkub6xg5of1wdde2"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Delete Namespace

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Deletes the given namespace. When a namespace is deleted all assets, in the namespace are deleted, this includes packages, functions and triggers. Deleting a namespace is a destructive operation and assets in the namespace are not recoverable after deletion. Some metadata is retained, such as activations, or soft deleted for reporting purposes. To delete namespace, send a DELETE request to /v2/functions/namespaces/$NAMESPACE_ID. A successful deletion returns a 204 response.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      namespace_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Example: fn-xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The ID of the namespace to be managed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/functions/namespaces/{namespace_id}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      curl -X DELETE \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/functions/namespaces/{{namespace_id}}"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "id": "unauthorized",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "message": "Unable to authenticate you."
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      List Triggers

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Returns a list of triggers associated with the current user and namespace. To get all triggers, send a GET request to /v2/functions/namespaces/$NAMESPACE_ID/triggers.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      namespace_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Example: fn-xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The ID of the namespace to be managed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/functions/namespaces/{namespace_id}/triggers

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • cURL
