                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      curl -X GET \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/functions/namespaces/{{namespace_id}}/triggers"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "triggers": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Create Trigger

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Creates a new trigger for a given function in a namespace. To create a trigger, send a POST request to /v2/functions/namespaces/$NAMESPACE_ID/triggers with the name, function, type, is_enabled and scheduled_details properties.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        namespace_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example: fn-xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The ID of the namespace to be managed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The trigger's unique name within the namespace.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        function
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Name of function(action) that exists in the given namespace.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        One of different type of triggers. Currently only SCHEDULED is supported.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        is_enabled
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        boolean

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Indicates weather the trigger is paused or unpaused.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        object (scheduled_details)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Trigger details for SCHEDULED type, where body is optional.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/functions/namespaces/{namespace_id}/triggers

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "name": "my trigger",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "function": "hello",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "type": "SCHEDULED",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "is_enabled": true,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "scheduled_details": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "cron": "* * * * *",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "body": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 400
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 422
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "trigger": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "namespace": "fn-xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "name": "my trigger",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "function": "hello",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "type": "SCHEDULED",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "is_enabled": true,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "created_at": "2022-11-11T04:16:45Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "updated_at": "2022-11-11T04:16:45Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "scheduled_details": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "scheduled_runs": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get Trigger

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Gets the trigger details. To get the trigger details, send a GET request to /v2/functions/namespaces/$NAMESPACE_ID/triggers/$TRIGGER_NAME.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              namespace_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Example: fn-xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The ID of the namespace to be managed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              trigger_name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Example: my trigger

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the trigger to be managed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/functions/namespaces/{namespace_id}/triggers/{trigger_name}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              curl -X GET \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/functions/namespaces/{{namespace_id}}/triggers/{{trigger_name}}"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "trigger": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "namespace": "fn-xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "name": "my trigger",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "function": "hello",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "type": "SCHEDULED",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "is_enabled": true,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "created_at": "2022-11-11T04:16:45Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "updated_at": "2022-11-11T04:16:45Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "scheduled_details": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "scheduled_runs": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Update Trigger

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Updates the details of the given trigger. To update a trigger, send a PUT request to /v2/functions/namespaces/$NAMESPACE_ID/triggers/$TRIGGER_NAME with new values for the is_enabled or scheduled_details properties.
