                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  namespace_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Example: fn-xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The ID of the namespace to be managed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  trigger_name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Example: my trigger

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The name of the trigger to be managed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  is_enabled
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  boolean

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Indicates weather the trigger is paused or unpaused.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  object (scheduled_details)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Trigger details for SCHEDULED type, where body is optional.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/functions/namespaces/{namespace_id}/triggers/{trigger_name}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "is_enabled": true,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "scheduled_details": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "cron": "* * * * *",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "body": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 400
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "trigger": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "namespace": "fn-xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "name": "my trigger",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "function": "hello",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "type": "SCHEDULED",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "is_enabled": true,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "created_at": "2022-11-11T04:16:45Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "updated_at": "2022-11-11T04:16:45Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "scheduled_details": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "scheduled_runs": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Delete Trigger

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Deletes the given trigger. To delete trigger, send a DELETE request to /v2/functions/namespaces/$NAMESPACE_ID/triggers/$TRIGGER_NAME. A successful deletion returns a 204 response.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        namespace_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example: fn-xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The ID of the namespace to be managed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        trigger_name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example: my trigger

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The name of the trigger to be managed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/functions/namespaces/{namespace_id}/triggers/{trigger_name}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        curl -X DELETE \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/functions/namespaces/{{namespace_id}}/triggers/{{trigger_name}}"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "id": "unauthorized",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "message": "Unable to authenticate you."
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Image Actions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Image actions are commands that can be given to a DigitalOcean image. In general, these requests are made on the actions endpoint of a specific image.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        An image action object is returned. These objects hold the current status of the requested action.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        List All Actions for an Image

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        To retrieve all actions that have been executed on an image, send a GET request to /v2/images/$IMAGE_ID/actions.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        image_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        integer
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example: 62137902

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        A unique number that can be used to identify and reference a specific image.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/images/{image_id}/actions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/images/7555620/actions?page=1&per_page=1"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "actions": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "links": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "pages": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "meta": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "total": 5
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
