                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve an Existing Image

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              To retrieve information about an image, send a GET request to /v2/images/$IDENTIFIER.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              integer or string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Examples:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 62137902 - Retrieve a public or private image by id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • ubuntu-16-04-x64 - Retrieve a public image by slug

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A unique number (id) or string (slug) used to identify and reference a specific image.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Public images can be identified by image id or slug.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Private images must be identified by image id.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/images/{image_id}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              # Get existing image by ID
curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/images/7555620"

# Get existing image by slug
curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/images/ubuntu-16-04-x64"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "image": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "id": 6918990,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "name": "14.04 x64",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "distribution": "Ubuntu",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "slug": "ubuntu-16-04-x64",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "public": true,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "regions": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "created_at": "2014-10-17T20:24:33Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "min_disk_size": 20,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "size_gigabytes": 2.34,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "description": "",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "tags": [ ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "status": "available",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "error_message": ""
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Update an Image

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                To update an image, send a PUT request to /v2/images/$IMAGE_ID. Set the name attribute to the new value you would like to use. For custom images, the description and distribution attributes may also be updated.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                image_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                integer
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Example: 62137902

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                A unique number that can be used to identify and reference a specific image.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                string (image_name)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                The display name that has been given to an image. This is what is shown in the control panel and is generally a descriptive title for the image in question.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                distribution
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                string (distribution)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Enum: "Arch Linux" "CentOS" "CoreOS" "Debian" "Fedora" "Fedora Atomic" "FreeBSD" "Gentoo" "openSUSE" "RancherOS" "Rocky Linux" "Ubuntu" "Unknown"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                The name of a custom image's distribution. Currently, the valid values are Arch Linux, CentOS, CoreOS, Debian, Fedora, Fedora Atomic, FreeBSD, Gentoo, openSUSE, RancherOS, Rocky Linux, Ubuntu, and Unknown. Any other value will be accepted but ignored, and Unknown will be used in its place.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                description
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                string (image_description)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                An optional free-form text field to describe an image.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/images/{image_id}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "name": "Nifty New Snapshot",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "distribution": "Ubuntu",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "description": " "
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "image": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "id": 7938391,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "name": "new-image-name",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "distribution": "Ubuntu",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "slug": null,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "public": false,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "regions": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "created_at": "2014-11-14T16:44:03Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "min_disk_size": 20,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "size_gigabytes": 2.34,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "description": "",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "tags": [ ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "status": "available",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "error_message": ""
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Delete an Image

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  To delete a snapshot or custom image, send a DELETE request to /v2/images/$IMAGE_ID.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  image_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  integer
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Example: 62137902

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  A unique number that can be used to identify and reference a specific image.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/images/{image_id}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Ruby
