                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "kubernetes_cluster": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "id": "bd5f5959-5e1e-4205-a714-a914373942af",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "name": "prod-cluster-01",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "region": "nyc1",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "version": "1.18.6-do.0",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "cluster_subnet": "10.244.0.0/16",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "service_subnet": "10.245.0.0/16",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "vpc_uuid": "c33931f2-a26a-4e61-b85c-4e95a2ec431b",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "ipv4": "",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "endpoint": "",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "tags": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "node_pools": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "maintenance_policy": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "auto_upgrade": false,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "status": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "created_at": "2018-11-15T16:00:11Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "updated_at": "2018-11-15T16:00:11Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "surge_upgrade": false,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "registry_enabled": false,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "ha": false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve an Existing Kubernetes Cluster

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              To show information about an existing Kubernetes cluster, send a GET request to /v2/kubernetes/clusters/$K8S_CLUSTER_ID.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              cluster_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              string <uuid> >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Example: bd5f5959-5e1e-4205-a714-a914373942af

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A unique ID that can be used to reference a Kubernetes cluster.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/kubernetes/clusters/{cluster_id}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/kubernetes/clusters/bd5f5959-5e1e-4205-a714-a914373942af"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "kubernetes_cluster": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "id": "bd5f5959-5e1e-4205-a714-a914373942af",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "name": "prod-cluster-01",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "region": "nyc1",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "version": "1.18.6-do.0",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "cluster_subnet": "10.244.0.0/16",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "service_subnet": "10.245.0.0/16",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "vpc_uuid": "c33931f2-a26a-4e61-b85c-4e95a2ec431b",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "ipv4": "68.183.121.157",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "endpoint": "https://bd5f5959-5e1e-4205-a714-a914373942af.k8s.ondigitalocean.com",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "tags": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "node_pools": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "maintenance_policy": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "auto_upgrade": false,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "status": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "created_at": "2018-11-15T16:00:11Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "updated_at": "2018-11-15T16:00:11Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "surge_upgrade": false,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "registry_enabled": false,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "ha": false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Update a Kubernetes Cluster

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      To update a Kubernetes cluster, send a PUT request to /v2/kubernetes/clusters/$K8S_CLUSTER_ID and specify one or more of the attributes below.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      cluster_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string <uuid> >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Example: bd5f5959-5e1e-4205-a714-a914373942af

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A unique ID that can be used to reference a Kubernetes cluster.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A human-readable name for a Kubernetes cluster.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      tags
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Array of strings

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      An array of tags applied to the Kubernetes cluster. All clusters are automatically tagged k8s and k8s:$K8S_CLUSTER_ID.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      object (maintenance_policy) Nullable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      An object specifying the maintenance window policy for the Kubernetes cluster.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      auto_upgrade
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      boolean
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Default: false

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A boolean value indicating whether the cluster will be automatically upgraded to new patch releases during its maintenance window.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      surge_upgrade
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      boolean
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Default: false

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A boolean value indicating whether surge upgrade is enabled/disabled for the cluster. Surge upgrade makes cluster upgrades fast and reliable by bringing up new nodes before destroying the outdated nodes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ha
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      boolean
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Default: false

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A boolean value indicating whether the control plane is run in a highly available configuration in the cluster. Highly available control planes incur less downtime. The property cannot be disabled.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/kubernetes/clusters/{cluster_id}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "name": "prod-cluster-01",
