                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/kubernetes/clusters/{cluster_id}/node_pools

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/kubernetes/clusters/bd5f5959-5e1e-4205-a714-a914373942af/node_pools"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "node_pools": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Add a Node Pool to a Kubernetes Cluster

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          To add an additional node pool to a Kubernetes clusters, send a POST request to /v2/kubernetes/clusters/$K8S_CLUSTER_ID/node_pools with the following attributes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          cluster_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          string <uuid> >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Example: bd5f5959-5e1e-4205-a714-a914373942af

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A unique ID that can be used to reference a Kubernetes cluster.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          size
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The slug identifier for the type of Droplet used as workers in the node pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A human-readable name for the node pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          count
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          integer

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The number of Droplet instances in the node pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          tags
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Array of strings

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          An array containing the tags applied to the node pool. All node pools are automatically tagged k8s, k8s-worker, and k8s:$K8S_CLUSTER_ID.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          labels
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          object Nullable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          An object containing a set of Kubernetes labels. The keys and are values are both user-defined.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Array of objects (kubernetes_node_pool_taint)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          An array of taints to apply to all nodes in a pool. Taints will automatically be applied to all existing nodes and any subsequent nodes added to the pool. When a taint is removed, it is removed from all nodes in the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          auto_scale
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          boolean

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A boolean value indicating whether auto-scaling is enabled for this node pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          min_nodes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          integer

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The minimum number of nodes that this node pool can be auto-scaled to. The value will be 0 if auto_scale is set to false.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          max_nodes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          integer

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The maximum number of nodes that this node pool can be auto-scaled to. The value will be 0 if auto_scale is set to false.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/kubernetes/clusters/{cluster_id}/node_pools

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "size": "s-1vcpu-2gb",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "count": 3,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "name": "new-pool",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "tags": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "frontend"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "auto_scale": true,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "min_nodes": 3,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "max_nodes": 6
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 201
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "node_pool": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "id": "cdda885e-7663-40c8-bc74-3a036c66545d",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "name": "new-pool",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "size": "s-1vcpu-2gb",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "count": 3,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "tags": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "labels": null,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "taints": [ ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "auto_scale": true,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "min_nodes": 3,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "max_nodes": 6,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "nodes": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve a Node Pool for a Kubernetes Cluster

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              To show information about a specific node pool in a Kubernetes cluster, send a GET request to /v2/kubernetes/clusters/$K8S_CLUSTER_ID/node_pools/$NODE_POOL_ID.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              cluster_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              string <uuid> >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Example: bd5f5959-5e1e-4205-a714-a914373942af

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A unique ID that can be used to reference a Kubernetes cluster.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              node_pool_id
