                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              string <uuid> >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Example: cdda885e-7663-40c8-bc74-3a036c66545d

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A unique ID that can be used to reference a Kubernetes node pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/kubernetes/clusters/{cluster_id}/node_pools/{node_pool_id}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/kubernetes/clusters/bd5f5959-5e1e-4205-a714-a914373942af/credentials"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "node_pool": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "id": "cdda885e-7663-40c8-bc74-3a036c66545d",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "name": "frontend-pool",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "size": "s-1vcpu-2gb",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "count": 3,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "tags": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • "labels": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "taints": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "auto_scale": false,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "min_nodes": 0,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "max_nodes": 0,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "nodes": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Update a Node Pool in a Kubernetes Cluster

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      To update the name of a node pool, edit the tags applied to it, or adjust its number of nodes, send a PUT request to /v2/kubernetes/clusters/$K8S_CLUSTER_ID/node_pools/$NODE_POOL_ID with the following attributes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      cluster_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string <uuid> >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Example: bd5f5959-5e1e-4205-a714-a914373942af

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A unique ID that can be used to reference a Kubernetes cluster.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      node_pool_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string <uuid> >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Example: cdda885e-7663-40c8-bc74-3a036c66545d

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A unique ID that can be used to reference a Kubernetes node pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      string

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A human-readable name for the node pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      count
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      integer

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The number of Droplet instances in the node pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      tags
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Array of strings

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      An array containing the tags applied to the node pool. All node pools are automatically tagged k8s, k8s-worker, and k8s:$K8S_CLUSTER_ID.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      labels
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      object Nullable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      An object containing a set of Kubernetes labels. The keys and are values are both user-defined.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Array of objects (kubernetes_node_pool_taint)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      An array of taints to apply to all nodes in a pool. Taints will automatically be applied to all existing nodes and any subsequent nodes added to the pool. When a taint is removed, it is removed from all nodes in the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      auto_scale
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      boolean

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A boolean value indicating whether auto-scaling is enabled for this node pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      min_nodes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      integer

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The minimum number of nodes that this node pool can be auto-scaled to. The value will be 0 if auto_scale is set to false.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      max_nodes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      integer

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The maximum number of nodes that this node pool can be auto-scaled to. The value will be 0 if auto_scale is set to false.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/kubernetes/clusters/{cluster_id}/node_pools/{node_pool_id}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "name": "frontend-pool",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "count": 3,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "tags": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "k8s",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "k8s:bd5f5959-5e1e-4205-a714-a914373942af",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "k8s-worker",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "production",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "web-team"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "labels": null,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "taints": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "auto_scale": true,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "min_nodes": 3,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "max_nodes": 6
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 202
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        application/json
