                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Array of strings

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    An array of checks that will be run when clusterlint executes checks.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/kubernetes/clusters/{cluster_id}/clusterlint

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "include_groups": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "basic",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "doks",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "security"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "include_checks": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "bare-pods",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "resource-requirements"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "exclude_groups": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "workload-health"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "exclude_checks": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "default-namespace"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 202
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "run_id": "50c2f44c-011d-493e-aee5-361a4a0d1844"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Fetch Clusterlint Diagnostics for a Kubernetes Cluster

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    To request clusterlint diagnostics for your cluster, send a GET request to /v2/kubernetes/clusters/$K8S_CLUSTER_ID/clusterlint. If the run_id query parameter is provided, then the diagnostics for the specific run is fetched. By default, the latest results are shown.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    To find out how to address clusterlint feedback, please refer to the clusterlint check documentation.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    bearer_auth (read)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    path Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    cluster_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    string <uuid> >= 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Example: bd5f5959-5e1e-4205-a714-a914373942af

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    A unique ID that can be used to reference a Kubernetes cluster.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    query Parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    run_id
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    string <uuid>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Example: run_id=50c2f44c-011d-493e-aee5-361a4a0d1844

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Specifies the clusterlint run whose results will be retrieved.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/kubernetes/clusters/{cluster_id}/clusterlint

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    curl -X GET \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN" \
  "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/kubernetes/clusters/bd5f5959-5e1e-4205-a714-a914373942af/clusterlint"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 404
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "run_id": "50c2f44c-011d-493e-aee5-361a4a0d1844",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "requested_at": "2019-10-30T05:34:07Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "completed_at": "2019-10-30T05:34:11Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "diagnostics": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Add Container Registry to Kubernetes Clusters

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      To integrate the container registry with Kubernetes clusters, send a POST request to /v2/kubernetes/registry.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Authorizations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      bearer_auth (write)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Request Body schema: application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      cluster_uuids
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Array of strings

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      An array containing the UUIDs of Kubernetes clusters.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      production

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/kubernetes/registry

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "cluster_uuids": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "bd5f5959-5e1e-4205-a714-a914373942af",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "50c2f44c-011d-493e-aee5-361a4a0d1844"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "id": "unauthorized",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "message": "Unable to authenticate you."
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Remove Container Registry from Kubernetes Clusters

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      To remove the container registry from Kubernetes clusters, send a DELETE request to /v2/kubernetes/registry.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Authorizations:
