                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Request samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Payload
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • cURL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Ruby
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Example
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Basic Create Request

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Passing requests directly through to 80 and 443.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "name": "example-lb-01",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "region": "nyc3",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • "forwarding_rules": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            },
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "droplet_ids": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 3164444,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 3164445
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "project_id": "9cc10173-e9ea-4176-9dbc-a4cee4c4ff30",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "http_idle_timeout_seconds": 60,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "firewall": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • "deny": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "allow": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Response samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 202
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 401
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 500
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Content type
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              application/json
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Example
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Basic Create Response
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • "load_balancer": {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "id": "4de7ac8b-495b-4884-9a69-1050c6793cd6",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "name": "example-lb-01",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "ip": "104.131.186.241",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "size": "lb-small",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "algorithm": "round_robin",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "status": "new",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "created_at": "2017-02-01T22:22:58Z",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • "forwarding_rules": [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ],

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      },
